{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01518v1", "title": "On 2-color partitions where one of the colors is multiples of $7^k$", "summary": "In this work, we investigate the arithmetic properties of $p_{1,7^k}(n)$,
which counts 2-color partitions of $n$ where one of the colors appears only in
parts that are multiples of $7^k$. By constructing generating functions for
$p_{1,7^k}(n)$ across specific arithmetic progressions, we establish a set of
Ramanujan-type infinite family of congruences modulo powers of $7$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-02T09:04:50Z"}
